ITEM_MOVED: Item was successfuly moved to the folder
ITEM_STARRED: Item was successfuly starred. You can see it in the Starred tab
ITEMS_STARRED: Items were successfuly starred. You can see them in the Starred tab
ITEMS_ARCHIVED: Items were successfuly archived. You can see them in the Archived tab
ITEMS_UNARCHIVED: Items were successfuly unarchived. You can now see them in the All tab
